data.name: Storybook Brawl
data.detailed_description:
Draft your favorite characters from story and myth in this 8 player card battler! Over 40 different heroes to command. Will you side with the evil vampire, Snow Wight? Or team up with the good Princess Peep and her battle hardened sheep? Deep strategy meets enchanting fun in Storybook Brawl!

CRAZY COMBOS!


Draft characters to your party, combining abilities, effects and combos to deal the greatest damage.

TONS OF HEROES!


Choose from 40 different heroes with fun and unique powers to lead your battle.

RARE TREASURES!


Match 3 characters or complete a quest to create a supercharged version and earn a treasure.

Weekly 100 PLAYER EVENTS!


We run weekly 100 player events with increased prize pools.

data.short_description: Draft your favorite characters from story and myth in this 8 player card battler! Over 40 different heroes to command. Will you side with the evil vampire, Snow Wight? Or team up with the good Princess Peep and her battle hardened sheep? Deep strategy meets enchanting fun in Storybook Brawl!
data.reviews:
“Storybook Brawl is an amazing game and my new favorite game to play when I have time to kill.”
Koalition

“Storybook Brawl features a host of characters from well-known fairy tales and myths, meaning you can see Baba Yaga facing off against Cinderella. It promises a light-hearted tone and gameplay that's easy to get to grips with.”
Pocket Gamer

“It doesn’t take that long to figure out how the game works, and once you do, it’s got a solid, addictive quality to it.”
Geek Wire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
